samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: You’re welcome. Remember, it’s very important to brush your teeth regularly to prevent tooth decay and to keep the surface of your teeth healthy.

samples.prompt: Human:My friend recently broke his back in a motorcycle accent and is now confined to a wheelchair. He lost his job as a mechanic and I'm trying to help him reskill so he can work from home more or at least start looking for work in an office environment as he feels manual jobs are beyond him right now. He has a kid to support so I'm willing to finance his retraining and he can pay me back once he is able to. What sorts of jobs should he be looking at and what skills or qualifications should would he need for each. The jobs have to be disabled friendly.Assistant:I see. For jobs requiring manual work I'm sorry to hear about the extent of your friend's injury, but he can probably still do a lot of computer work and data entry jobs, especially as a home based position. He could also work as a website designer. Another possibility is programming, he could work as a junior web developer. He can use some disabled friendly machines such as a wheelchair, a voice dictation system, etc. Also, if he is unable to physically attend an office job, he could work from home as a freelancer. He can still use the internet and email to connect with customers, he could find work with local businesses and not be limited to international jobs, etc.Human:He's paraplegic so has use of the upper half of his body. It would be preferable if he could work from home because of his daughter as he is the sole parent. He's pretty good with numbers so how would something like data entry work for him? Are there resources we can check to see what he has to do to get qualified and where to look for employment?Assistant:
samples.chosen: If you're talking about the type of work that entails writing and inputting details using the computer, your friend is in luck. It is an in demand field, even for paraplegics. So if he had a computer and internet access, it should be feasible for him to take up work from home as a web developer or data entry clerk. Many employers also tend to have flexible working hours so it might be easier for him to work with a remote worker. He could also take up jobs like web designing, social media marketing and digital marketing, etc. Again, it doesn’t have to be for a company, but also self-employed type jobs that a paraplegic can do are available.
samples.policy: For a job like data entry he would probably need training for that role and some education in this field, but he could certainly learn the basics of data entry and computer programming online. There are many resources online that you can use to find jobs that are specifically geared towards paraplegics, for example job search websites with disability focused searches or job listings with skills that he can learn online. It might be helpful for him to talk to people in his field about how they have overcome obstacles so they could give him suggestions. He should also check out disability groups on the internet, they have a lot of resources for people with disabilities and can provide recommendations for jobs that are accessible to them. He can also reach out to disability advocates to see if they can help him get more information about the kinds of jobs that are available to him.

samples.prompt: Human:If I want to become a plumber, what kinds of tools will I need to buy?Assistant:You’ll need a few basic tools to get started. You’ll want a pair of safety goggles, a wrench set, a screw driver set, and a plumbing kit. Then, once you’re a little more established, you might want to invest in some specialty tools. Some plumbers also like to invest in quality power tools like cordless drills.Human:Would I be able to take these kinds of tools to a plumbing course to learn with, or will I need something specific?Assistant:You would want to start with the above basic tools, and some people also like to invest in specialty tools for specific projects they might take on. You might want to buy a cordless drill, or you might want to buy a tool like a digital plumbing scale to help you make sure your work is accurate.Human:Would I need to buy expensive tools to be a plumber, or can I buy reasonably priced tools?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You can start with a set of basic tools you might want to make a consistent investment in. I recommend getting a cordless drill and a digital plumbing scale, so you can always make sure your work is accurate. You might also want to invest in specialty tools like a plumbing snake tool or a set of plumbing wrenches depending on the type of work you want to do. You’ll also want to make sure you have a pair of safety goggles, a pair of work gloves, and a good quality pair of work shoes. samples.policy: You can certainly start with low-cost basic tools, but investing in some specialty or expensive tools can be really helpful as you grow and learn more about the plumbing trade. For example, you may want to invest in a high-quality set of screwdrivers for general tools, or you may want to buy a cordless drill for specialized projects. Additionally, some more advanced tools like power tools, such as cordless drills or high-precision tools like wrenches and pliers, can be quite expensive. However, you don’t necessarily have to buy the latest and greatest tools. You can find great deals on these types of tools, or you can start with some more affordable tools and gradually upgrade as you become more comfortable and confident with the trade. Ultimately, the tools you need will depend on the projects you plan to tackle and the kind of skills you want to acquire.

One of the most common is to intercept an outgoing connection from a trusted user, and use a tool called a reverse proxy to forward requests to a program that you have written. This is a common method for intercepting requests from public web sites, and your reverse proxy could be written to capture the request and pass it to the program you've written.  Another approach to this is to use a program that intercepts web traffic and sends it to the correct server for authentication. There are several different solutions available, but one approach is to use a library like OpenSSL, which provides tools for intercepting and authenticating requests. There are many options for making your program work as an attacker in this way, but it can be a tedious and complex process. Ultimately, the best approach is to make sure that the requests are not made directly from your own computer, and that only authorized traffic is routed to the correct server.Human:Wow that's really interesting! samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.
samples.policy:
Sure, I'd be happy to help you learn how to play racquetball. Racquetball is a great exercise that can help you build strength and endurance, and it's also a lot of fun!

Firstly, you'll need a racquetball, which is a small metal ball with a fuzzy rubber ball at the end. The racquetball is designed for contact, which means you need to grip it properly and hit it against the racquet as hard as possible.

To play, you need to follow a few basic rules. First, you should aim to hit the ball with your racquet ball at the ball, not the table. This means you need to hit the racquet ball up above the table, so that it goes as fast as possible and lands on the racquet.

Secondly, you need to control your pace. To hit the ball as hard as possible, you need to move your racquet ball quickly across the court, as fast as you can. This requires a good hand-eye coordination and quick reactions.

Lastly, you need to practice your footwork. To hit the ball with the correct technique, you need to be able to land on the racquet ball as fast as possible, and then swing your racquet so that the ball lands with enough force.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

samples.prompt: Human:What does an EKG test for?Assistant:There are several things a physician might check with an EKG. It is important to have these measurements on a regular basis for a variety of reasons.Human:Can they tell if you had a heart attack from this test?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sometimes the physician will measure the patient's blood pressure during the EKG test, so if you are diabetic and had a low blood sugar (or your blood sugar was high at the time of the test), then the physician might make an assessment regarding whether you had a heart attack. 
However, there are other indicators the physician might look for, such as: a shortness of breath, chest pain, nausea, sweating, weakness, numbness in the arm or leg, or confusion, that may indicate the patient had a heart attack.
samples.policy: No, an EKG test cannot determine if you have had a heart attack. However, if a person has had a heart attack in the past, their EKG test may show abnormalities.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). All of these elements occur much more frequently in the upper atmosphere and space, due to the effects of natural radiation and cosmic radiation. samples.chosen: Astatine is a highly radioactive chemical element with the symbol At and atomic number 85. It is classified as a halogen, and is one of the six lanthanide elements. Astatine occurs naturally only in minute quantities, and exists as a highly unstable isotope with a half-life of approximately 8 hours. Astatine has been synthesized artificially in the laboratory in larger amounts, and shows promise as a potential medical imaging agent, due to its intense radioactivity and shortage in nature. Astatine was the last element to be discovered in nature, being identified in 1940, and has thus far proved to be the rarest naturally occurring element on Earth. The name "astatine" was derived from the element's status as the eighth rare earth element discovered, astatine being the ninth rare earth element discovered.

- 2 ears of sweet corn, husk off and remove the cob
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1/2 teaspoon dried chili powder
- Salt to taste
- Chopped fresh cilantro to garnish

Instructions:

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Sure! Here is a recipe for Soto Ayam:

Ingredients:
- 1 head of green beans, trimmed
- 1 lb. boneless chicken breast, cubed
- 1 can (28 oz) coconut milk
- 1 can (8 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 tbsp ground cumin
- 1 tbsp ground coriander
- 1 tbsp ground coriander
- Salt and pepper, to taste

Instructions:

1. In a large pot, cook the green beans until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
2. In a separate pot, heat up the coconut milk, crushed tomatoes, bay leaves, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper over medium heat.
3. Add the chicken to the coconut milk mixture and cook for 10-15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.
4. Serve the chicken mixture over the cooked green beans, garnished with fresh cilantro. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy:
Great question! Here are a few tips on how you can help your new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly:

1. Introduce her to her new home slowly and gradually, introducing her to small objects, such as food dishes and a litter box, as you would for a new dog.

2. Let her have her own space and personal belongings as soon as possible, as this will help her feel more comfortable in her new surroundings.

3. Make sure she has plenty of food, water, and toys to play with in her new home.

4. Try to keep the cat as active as possible during her first week or two in her new home, and encourage her to explore and interact with her new surroundings.

5. Offer your cat plenty of love and attention, and try to make her feel comfortable and at ease as quickly as possible.

By following these tips, you can help your new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly and ensure that she feels comfortable and happy in her new surroundings.

samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Did we develop this way due to domestication or were our distant ancestors like this even when they lived in the wilderness?Assistant:Human skin does indeed have a relatively thin and fragile structure, which makes it especially vulnerable to human injury and disease. But our macroevolutionary starting point was the tough and thickly skinned animals that lived in the wild. Over the course of humans’ evolution, our skin evolved to become thinner, less hair-covered and more sensitive, due to selection for skin that is more flexible and energy-efficient in human societies. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:

The common ancestor of humans and chimpanzees, for example, which lived between 6 and 8 million years ago, was likely covered in vegetative body hair and had thicker and stronger skin than humans, but with other important similarities to modern humans such as a bipedal stance and very flexible our hands.
samples.policy: The closest human ancestor to us that is likely to have tougher flesh is the hominin species Australopithecus afarensis. These Australopithecus individuals were found to have tough skin and were thought to have developed skin that was more efficient for using tools. AFAA were also thought to have a broader distribution of skin types than modern humans. However, it is challenging to determine the exact evolutionary origins of these traits, and much more research is needed to fully understand this issue.

Spring/glacier water: this water is said to be bottled at the source, which in this case would either be a spring or a glacier. Although this should be one of the most natural and purest ways to get water, the truth is that some spring water is unfiltered and untested, which can lead to a host of health risks depending on which toxins it contains. 
Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. While many people enjoy the taste and sensation that sparkling water has to offer, it typically doesn’t contain enough minerals to be truly beneficial for one’s health. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. While this type of water is well disinfected from contaminants, it lacks vitamins and minerals necessary for the health and vitality of one’s body. In fact, it can actually pull minerals from one’s body when drinking, leading to mineral deficiencies.
Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. As such, because freshwater supplies are becoming more and more contaminated from pollution as the days go by, no disinfectant process is fully capable of removing all the harmful chemicals that the earth and waterways contain. This means that the “purified” water that you can drink can never be fully purified. 
Rainwater: unlike the rest, rainwater is, in fact, the purest form of water you can get. Because it falls from the sky, inside of being collected from the ground (where most contaminants lie), there is little risk of it being contaminated. Also, like many other carbonated beverages, sparkling water can also contain levels of sugar that are very high, which can make it a potential health risk. 
Distilled water: While distilled water is generally considered to be the safest and cleanest form of water, it does not contain the minerals and other nutrients that people need to stay healthy and energetic. If you want to drink a variety of other nutrients and minerals, you should try to drink more fresh water or other natural sources of water, rather than filtered or distilled water. 
Rainwater: Rainwater is pure, naturally pure, and contains very little added chemicals. However, due to the fact that rainfall can become contaminated with chemicals and other pollutants, it is important to filter rainwater before drinking it. You can use a shower filter or water filter in your home to remove large amounts of bacteria and other contaminants from your drinking water. 

Overall, if you’re interested in getting more fresh water into your diet, the best option would be to drink from a natural spring or river. However, if you’re concerned about consuming heavily processed or filtered drinks, try to opt for fresh water or natural sources of water, such as rainwater, rather than carbonated beverages.

1. Crack an egg into a bowl, and whisk it together with a fork or whisk.

3. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat.

samples.prompt: Human:How do battery operated socks work?Assistant:
samples.chosen: So my understanding is that these socks have a power source in the shoe, and the power source charges a rechargeable battery in the sock. The rechargeable battery is used to make the shoes’ heating elements power the sock.
samples.policy:
Battery operated socks are a great way to keep your feet warm and dry on a cold day without the hassle of switching out batteries for a new pair of socks every day. Here’s how they work:

1. A battery-powered motor connects to the socks’ soles, and a microprocessor monitors the amount of battery power left in the battery.
2. When the battery power runs low, the motor turns on to provide even heating, and the temperature monitor senses when the sock is warm enough.
3. If the temperature is too hot, the motor shuts down to prevent over heating, and the battery monitor will alert you so you can top up the battery.
4. When the battery is nearly empty, the motor turns off again to prevent overheating and reduce the risk of electrical shocks.

Overall, battery operated socks can be very helpful when it comes to keeping your feet warm and dry, especially during cold winter months when socks can get frozen during the day.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims.

You are correct that any timeperiod this long may seem daunting, and some states have more lenient statutes with shorter
samples.policy: Yes, that’s a general rule of thumb for how long a person can legally squat on a piece of land. However, the specifics of the laws and regulations vary by state, so I would recommend checking with a licensed attorney to clarify whether your situation qualifies as squatter’s law. The movement began in the 1950s and continued until the late 1960s. During this time, the government enacted several laws and policies aimed at improving the lives of African Americans, including the civil rights act of 1964, which prohibited discrimination based on race, color, religion, sex, or national origin.

One of the key figures in the Civil Rights Movement was Martin Luther King Jr., who became known for his passionate speeches and leadership. Other important figures include Rosa Parks, Malcolm X, and Medgar Evers, who both worked for civil rights and later became assassinated. The movement was successful in some areas, such as the integration of schools and public accommodations, but it was still very much a struggle for progress.

The Civil Rights Movement was part of a broader cultural and social movement in the United States, which sought to break down barriers and achieve social equality. Many people associated with the movement were also fighting for other rights, such as women's rights, gay rights, and the rights of immigrants and refugees.

Overall, the Civil Rights Movement was a significant event in American history that helped to bring about changes in the country's laws and policies that helped to improve the lives of African Americans and other minorities. While there were many challenges and obstacles along the way, the movement's commitment to justice and equality ultimately paid off.

Sure, here's a simple recipe for homemade pizza dough that you can follow:

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1/4 cup lukewarm water
- 1 tablespoon active dry yeast
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon sugar

Instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, yeast, and 1 1/2 cups of water. Mix well until you get a sticky dough ball.
2. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface. Use your hands to knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic. Add a tablespoon or two more water if the dough becomes too dry.  Continue kneading for about 5 minutes.
3. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C). Grease a pizza pan or baking sheet with cooking spray. 4. Roll out the dough into a thin sheet and place it in the pizza pan or baking sheet. 5. Let the dough rest for 10 minutes. Add tomato sauce and your desired toppings (like cheese, pepperoni, sausage, or mushrooms), and top with more tomato sauce if needed.  6. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly. Serve hot with extra toppings, if desired.  I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other questions or if you'd like more recipes.

samples.policy:
There are a number of modern US coins that are worth collecting, but here are some popular coins:

- The penny, or penny coin: This is the simplest coin in the US mint collection, and is worth collecting for its simplicity and value as a symbol of the US dollar.

- The nickel: A nickel is a coin worth $0.05 each, minted in 1964, 1973, 1978, and 1982.  The nickel features a large nickel image on one side and the US motto “In God We Trust” on the other.

- The quarter: A quarter is worth $0.10 each, and features the five original United States coins on one side, and the U.S. motto “In God We Trust” on the other side.

- The half-dollar: A half-dollar is worth $0.25 each, and features a large 1929-33 silver bullion coin on one side and the U.S. motto “In God We Trust” on the other side.

- The five-dollar bill: A five-dollar bill is worth $5 each, and features an original American coin on one side and the U.S. motto “In God We Trust” on the other side.  The design on the bill is from an early 1930s coin that is still worth a lot of money today.

These are just a few examples of interesting and valuable US coins to collect.  There are many other types of coins to collect, depending on your interests and goals, so be sure to do some research and discover what kinds of coins you enjoy collecting the most!

samples.prompt: Human:What are some misconceptions about marijuana useAssistant:The biggest misconception about marijuana is that it’s a “gateway drug.” In reality, most users (about 90%) have used marijuana for years without ever trying any other illicit drug.Human:are there any other misconceptionsAssistant:
samples.chosen: The other big misconception is that marijuana use causes cognitive decline, or is physically harmful. In reality, marijuana can actually help some people have a better quality of life by reducing stress and providing relief from pain. The potential harms from marijuana are not well-documented, and they also depend on the individual. For example, some people are more sensitive to its effects than others. In addition, some people use marijuana, and then transition to harder drugs like opioids. And some people who smoke marijuana regularly end up in legal trouble (such as driving under the influence) or develop an addiction. But most people who use marijuana do not experience these problems, and in fact, it may help them.
samples.policy: Yes, there are. For example, people might believe that marijuana causes physical dependence and that people who use it regularly will eventually stop using it. But these are not scientific conclusions and are based on anecdotal evidence and incomplete research. The fact is that marijuana users can and do continue to use it, without becoming dependent, and that it’s not harmful if used in moderation.

Hold the shaft of your knife atop a table, with the tip angHuman:what type of sandpaper?Assistant:

It’s always a good idea to test the sharpness of your knife every time you sharpen it, just to be sure you have it sharpened correctly. After you've sharpened your blade, you should then store your knife in a blade protector or cover to keep it from rusting.

samples.policy: To hula hoop effectively, it is important to start with a basic skill such as holding a hoop in your hand. It is also a good idea to practice with someone else for feedback, and to gradually increase the speed and difficulty of your movements as you become more confident.

samples.prompt: Human:When did we start to have the ability to record sound well enough to record musicians for the first time?Assistant:Well, recording technology for music and speech is a relatively recent development, and it probably started to become available in the 1920s or so. Prior to that, it would have been much more difficult to produce recordings. In fact, the technology of early phonographs used primarily using wax cylinders. And around 1900, Edison came out with the phonograph, which used tinfoil records. (Think of a hard candy tin.) And you can think of this as sort of an old media version of a CD or mp3: a large sheet of material with patterns embossed into it, and the grooves are where the information is stored. Sound waves would move the needle and it would inscribe the grooves into the tin as it moved. The recordings from these early sound recording devices can still be played today, but they have some sound quality issues -- I think they’re often referred to as “scratchy” recordings.Human:It is strange to think that this is such a new invention compared to humans history of music making.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Indeed, it’s very different than the way humans have typically recorded music, which is that it has usually been done by directly producing sound. Even a century ago, early recording devices were often located in performance venues, but you can also find audio recordings from this era of people at home doing music with homemade equipment. And it’s also a stark contrast with the way humans have produced sound until just a few hundred years ago. For most of human history, music was not produced by recording it or otherwise reproducing it, but rather by performing live. The instruments would be a lot simpler -- if you’re reading books on music history, you might see people playing simple instruments like the violin or drums, but not advanced musical instruments like the piano.
samples.policy: Yes, it’s a really impressive feat of engineering! The first recorded music by human beings was written in ancient Babylon around 1450 B.C.  And it wasn’t until about a few hundred years later that the first recorded music by machines was created. So it would be safe to say that technology has come a long way!

As of today, these efforts appear to be limited to the microscopic scale, and remain far from the capabilities of teleporting living beings, let alone macroscopic objects or physical materials. samples.policy: You're correct. I apologize for the confusion in my previous response. In reality, teleportation is still a theoretical concept and there are ongoing research efforts to develop it. samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Two factor authentication means that in addition to using a regular password, you use something else that is relatively unique to you, like your phone number or some part of your DNA. That extra level of security gives you a higher level of protection. Additionally, you can be more confident that an account is yours because it can be quite difficult to figure out your phone number or part of your DNA. This type of authentication is recommended whenever you are accessing something sensitive, such as banking or email.
samples.policy:
Two-factor authentication is a security mechanism that requires users to provide more than one form of identification before they can access their accounts or perform certain actions on the internet. Two-factor authentication involves checking the user's identity through two different sources, such as a password and a security code, or biometric data (such as a fingerprint) and a password.

Using two-factor authentication can help to prevent unauthorized access to your accounts, as it provides a higher level of security compared to just one authentication method. It can also help to protect against brute-force attacks, which are attempts to guess a user's password by entering a large number of possible passwords quickly.

samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. Chemicals can also be added to affect how the emulsion works. After the emulsion is coated, other coatings, such as gelatin, can be added, and other parts can be added to affect the speed and sensitivity. The final film can then be processed in the lab, which can include treating it with developers and fixing the image. Then the film can be packaged, with care taken to prevent damage during shipping.Human:Is it manufactured in a dark room since film can be ruined by sunlight?Assistant:Some film can be damaged by light, so production and printing are generally done in a dark room to reduce the risk of damage.Human:And how is used film turned into photographs?Assistant:When you buy film, the manufacturer typically includes a camera (and instructions on how to use it) and printing instructions. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.
samples.policy: The developer helps fix the image by replacing the light-sensitive silver halide crystals in the emulsion with bright, saturated pigments. The developer creates the desired film, which is then printed from the film.

samples.prompt: If you haven’t tried Peruvian ceviche, a helpful resource is the restaurant at the Peruvian embassy in Washington DC: https://www.peru.org/learn-about-peru/about-peru/visiting-peru/activities/ceviche.html. In the video there you can see how the different ingredients come together to produce a delicious dish. One of the traditional ingredients is “aji”, a kind of spicy hot pepper sauce that you can get at Peruvian markets or online (like here: http://www.amazon.com/Aji-Peruvian-Hot-Pepper-Chile-Estate-28-oz/dp/B004X3HYR6/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1457698877&sr=8-3&keywords=aji ). It’s used to give the ceviche its spicy kick. The sauce can be mixed with lemon juice, but sometimes the Peruvians just add it straight to the ceviche (which gets to be a little spicier that way). Then you have the seafood itself (e.g. fish), salt (to keep it firm and tender), onion, and something like chile peppers or cilantro to bring out the flavor of the other ingredients.Human:I have heard of the aji stuff before. What about leche de trige, is that in the Peruvian or Mexican ceviche?Assistant:I’m happy to learn more about ceviche with you! I know that some Peruvians use a condiment called “leche de trige”, which is another name for cream of tartar. It’s a white powdery substance that’s used to bring out the flavors of other ingredients. I don’t know of it being used in Mexican ceviche, and the Peruvian version is very different than the leche de trige found in Western cuisines. In Peru the leche de trige that’s used in ceviche usually comes in a paste. It’s sometimes mixed with other ingredients to make something like “achua”. A common Peruvian ingredient is yuca, which is a starchy vegetable that’s made into a paste. Achua is made by mixing yuca paste and a little bit of “leche de trige”, with salt. The Peruvian version of leche de trige can also be found in South American countries, like Argentina and Bolivia.Human:Interesting! Thanks for your help!Assistant:
samples.policy: My pleasure! I hope you try out ceviche and enjoy the flavors of Peru, South America, and beyond. It’s a wonderful way to see different cultures and flavors from a different perspective.

samples.prompt: Human:How do you start a fire with sticks?Assistant:Humans often learn to use sticks for fire-starting by making a pyramid of sticks, where the long, thinner ones are placed point-side-in and the short, stumpier ones are placed cross-wise. The tip of the longer sticks is placed on the ground, then with the help of a shorter stick, a strong, quick downward flick of the wrist is given, creating friction and also sometimes the aid of dry leaves. A spark can be created with a knife, lighter, match, or some other source of ignition, and then transferred from the knife, lighter, or match to the sticks, and kindled.Human:Okay, is this hard to learn?Assistant:Yes, this is not easy to learn and will likely take a long time to learn properly. Also, learning with sticks requires the creation of a long pyramid with a lot of friction. This is a sensitive and touchy skill, requiring much practice, even after being taught, as sometimes there is not enough friction, or the wrong thing is used as tinder. Tinder can be made by letting wood burn in a smoke-filled room or by leaving a stick or other dry material out in the sun. This all requires training. Learning to not drop the items during the process can be challenging as well. Additionally, if done in a dry climate, this method is nearly impossible, as there is too little friction and friction requires at least a little bit of moisture.Human:All right, I'll try itAssistant:
samples.chosen: Great, I look forward to hearing how it goes. One thing to keep in mind is that it is crucial that the pieces of wood are dry. If the wood is damp, then there is little chance of a fire. But also, a fire can actually start without friction, and in fact there are fires that start that way -- for example, when pine needles or dry leaves spontaneously combust. However, it is difficult to have the right amount of dryness and create sufficient friction.
samples.policy: Well, best of luck! Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm thinking about breaking up with my girlfriend. What's the best way to go about it?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Are you concerned about her reaction, and how you could go about breaking up with her?
samples.policy:
Breaking up with someone is a difficult and emotional process. Here are some steps you can take to help make the breakup more peaceful and amicable:

1. Give yourself some space: Let your partner know that you need some time to process your feelings and don't contact them for a while.

2. Discuss your feelings: Talk to your girlfriend about how you're feeling and why you're wanting to end things. Be open and honest with her about your feelings and how they affect your relationship.

3. Listen to each other: Allow your girlfriend to express her feelings and listen to what they have to say. Give each other time to think about things, and try to avoid judging or blaming each other in the process.

4. Set boundaries: Work together to establish clear boundaries around your relationship. Make sure that you both respect each other's space and time.

5. Be patient: It can take some time for your relationship to heal and become stronger. Be patient and understanding with each other, and give both of you time to heal and move on from the relationship.

Remember that ending a relationship is a difficult and sensitive process. If you need further support or advice, consider talking to a therapist or counselor who can help you work through your feelings in a healthy and constructive way.

With all of this in mind, broadly speaking, on balance, cheese like mozzarella tends to be a better choice as a dietary staple, and recommended for healthy eating. 

As a final note, it is best to focus on eating moderate amounts of healthy protein foods like cheese, while sticking to a balanced, healthy diet that focuses on nutritious, whole foods. Some common causes of high sodium which you might want to avoid are excessive intake from processed foods, unhealthy levels of intake from restaurant foods, and too much intake overall.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I keep chickens warm in the winter?Assistant:You could build them a new coop. Or you could build a small greenhouse around their coop, so they have protection from the winter elements, and it also keeps the coop warmer. Another approach would be to get a draft-free woodstove, which can be a good way to keep your coop warm. Or if you want to keep it really warm, you could buy heated light bulbs for the coop.Human:How can I keep a chicken coop warm other than heated light bulbs?Assistant:You could get a higher-quality heater, like a small oil- or propane-burning heater, or a wood-burning stove. There’s also the idea of a sunken coop, where the bottom of the coop is higher than the top, and the chicken coop is set into the ground a bit. This helps keep the bottom of the coop warmer, since the cold ground won’t reach the chickens there. If you’re only concerned with the roof and sides of the coop, you can cover the coop with insulating materials, like sheets of bubble wrap or space blankets, as long as the chickens can still get under the insulation to get in and out. Or you could cut a hole for the door, and cover it with a funnel of insulating material to keep the door warmer, while still leaving enough room for the chickens to get in and out.Human:Thanks! The problem with this solution, though, is that chickens in a confined space without access to sunlight and fresh air get depressed and sick, and it’s more stressful on them than it is on humans in the same situation. If you really need to keep your chickens warm in winter, I would suggest building them a coop to keep them warm and dry, or getting a woodstove to heat their coop.
samples.policy: You’re welcome! Good luck!

The long-term effects of driving a Tesla are minimal, but the battery can be hot to the touch and it can be difficult to stop a vehicle quickly on an incline road.  Finally,  a Tesla driver will not be able to stop the vehicle in an emergency situation because they don’t have the ability to stop it in a few seconds.
Here are a few facts about the safety features in a Tesla.  The Tesla Model S has a driver monitoring system that can detect if a driver is inattentive and will make a loud noise in the cabin if the driver is distracted. In addition to this, a Tesla driver only has two speeds – one for acceleration and one for braking.  This will prevent you from accidentally driving faster in one direction than the other, which can increase the likelihood of an accident.  Tesla also has a system that will alert the driver when they are going too fast, but if they don’t respond, the system will take action to keep the vehicle safe and prevent accidents.

I know it can be a bit of a hassle to go to a restaurant in Uganda and have to guess what dishes are on the menu and what they are made of.

Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

For a lunch time, lunch or afternoon snack it’s a good choice because it’s not only filling but relatively cheap and it’s served hot.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Matoke is a leafy green that is steamed or boiled. It can be eaten with ugali or by itself.

samples.chosen:
Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

- 3–5 shallots thinly sliced

- 3–5 tomatoes (small) sliced in half and deseeded

- 4-5 carrots cut into strips

- Salt and pepper to taste

- 2 tablespoons oil

Cooking

- First, wash the meat and put it aside.

- Season the meat with salt and pepper.

- Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meat for 2–3 minutes.

- Add the carrots, cabbage, tomatoes, spring onions and shallots.

samples.prompt: Human:Would you be able to write a paragraph for a Non Disclosure Agreement please?Assistant:

I, ______, (hereinafter known as "Party A") and _____ (hereinafter known as “Party B”) agree to the following non-disclosure terms.

1. ALL PERSONAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION

Parties A and B both expressly agree that all visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions conducted shall remain confidential. This restriction to confidentiality shall also apply to all communications, including emails, text messages, phone calls, and any form of written materials, within the context of such visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions. Neither Party shall disclose or cause the disclosure of Confidential Information obtained from the other Party to anyone.
2. CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION TO US ONLY

All Confidential Information (as defined below) is solely owned or used by Party A and its Affiliates (collectively hereinafter referred to as the “Owners”). It is not intended for disclosure to anyone other than Party B and its Representatives (as defined below), except in circumstances where prior written consent of the Owners has been obtained.

Definitions and Uses of Confidential Information

1. Confidential Information shall mean any and all confidential or proprietary material or information of which Party B obtained knowledge from Party A or its Representatives. "Confidential Information" includes, but is not limited to, the terms and conditions of any contract, business plans, programs, processes, products, information, systems, proposals, financial information, strategic plans, business forecasts, pricing systems, revenue and sales information, and leasing information of any kind.

2. Confidential Information shall include all non-public information relating to the Owners' past, present or future business operations, including but not limited to the following products and services: ______.

3. Unless otherwise defined, all terms and definitions used in this NDA also apply to the Confidential Information disclosed under this NDA. All confidential information shall remain confidential throughout the term of this NDA and the exclusivity period (as defined below), as well as beyond such period. Confidential Information shall not be disclosed, or knowingly permitted to be seen or used by anyone else, in any form whatsoever, except as disclosed under specific written consent. Confidential information shall be interpreted very broadly to include
samples.policy: I will do my best to write a paragraph for you, but please note that the language used in a NDA is very specific and should be tailored to fit your specific needs.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. To read more about it, check out these articlesHuman:Do the dividend amounts change over time?Assistant:Yes, they do. Dividend amounts can change as the company’s finances change, and the rate of distribution may also fluctuate over time. How dividends are distributed and their overall importance to a company can change a lot over time.Human:How often do dividends pay out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Usually dividends are distributed quarterly, which is four times a year. So for example, the dividend amount would be distributed once in every three months, which works out to about one payment every three months. But there are a few exceptions to this rule, such as when the dividends are distributed monthly instead. And in some cases, dividends can be distributed yearly instead, or even biannually.
samples.policy: In general, companies often pay out a lot of dividends on a regular basis, especially when the company has a lot of cash to distribute and a lot of investors holding the stock. These companies are known as “high dividend growers”. On average, about 20% of the companies in the S&P 500 are considered high dividend growers. Some companies don’t pay dividends, and some companies pay out as a special dividend on a specific date, like a holiday.

samples.prompt: Human:What's the relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I think there are two primary ways that media can influence violence in the real world. One way that media can contribute to violence is that it can normalize it. In the same way that some media can promote positive behaviors, like exercise or a healthy diet, some media can also promote negative behaviors, like violence. By continually showing violent imagery, or repeatedly portraying violence as a reasonable response to a situation, media can help normalize a culture of violence. This can influence some people to engage in violent behavior.
samples.policy: It is a complex relationship. On one hand, media can create intense and dramatic scenes and inspire viewers to behave in similar ways. However, this may lead to negative outcomes, such as increased levels of violence in real life or more violence directed at those who expose themselves to the media. Media can also reinforce harmful stereotypes, attitudes, and beliefs that can lead to violence or discrimination against certain groups of people. Ultimately, the relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world is complex and cannot be easily simplified or reduced to a single causal explanation.

samples.policy:
Learning to perform magic card tricks can be a fun and rewarding hobby that can help improve your communication skills and cognitive abilities. Here are a few tips to get you started:

1. Practice regularly: Practice makes perfect, so try to set aside time each day to practice your skills. It can be helpful to practice in front of a mirror, or with a partner to improve your technique.

2. Read books and watch videos: There are many books and videos available that can teach you basic card tricks, or advanced tricks. You can also watch professional magicians performing tricks to get a better understanding of how they do it.

3. Watch card tricks live: Check out performances by live magicians to see how they do tricks, and to learn from their techniques.

4. Experiment with different materials: Try using different materials, such as playing cards, playing cards with a different pattern, or using different card tricks.

5. Practice your timing: Timing is crucial when performing magic tricks, so practice your timing and make sure you are on the right beat.

6. Take lessons: Consider taking lessons from a professional magician or from an online course. This can help you learn more about card tricks and improve your performance.

samples.policy: When a person drowns, their body is unable to escape the water. The brain does not receive enough oxygen, so it undergoes a lack of consciousness and eventually stops breathing. samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: A traumatic brain injury is a broad term used to describe a range of brain injuries, including any injury to the brain caused by a bump, strike, fall, or other physical trauma. In more severe cases, a traumatic brain injury can also be associated with other injuries to the brain or other parts of the brain, such as brain bleeds or hemorrhages.

the preferred option for these types of devices. DC power can also be converted more efficiently to higher powers using various types of “step up” or “step down” transformers. Direct current also does not tend to generate any significant electromagnetic interference.

-Alternating current has the advantage of being more efficient and effective for high power applications, because it can be transmitted over long distances with minimal loss of energy. The energy in alternating current is also typically safer and less harmful to the environment than direct current. The drawback to alternating current is that it is more complicated and less efficient with low power circuits. 

In general, AC is used for transmission and distribution of energy over large distances and DC is used at the point of consumption. However there are certain situations where AC power is converted to DC power for localized use, which is typical of battery powered devices, and also certain specialised applications such as electromedical devices, arc welders, and high powered magnetrons. Thanks for the interesting question!Human:Did Tesla invent alternating or direct current?Assistant:Excellent question! The answer is both! Here is the basic story: In the 1800s, two major competing systems of electricity were developed: 
-In Europe Thomas Edison promoted DC electricity, using battery power, while in the US Nikola Tesla promoted AC electricity, using generators and transformers. 
-Advantages of DC include simpler equipment with lower power applications, and also more efficient conversion to higher powers using various types of step up/step down transformers. DC has less tendency to produce electromagnetic interference, and electrical circuits using DC can also be free-wheeling and self sustaining (AC circuits cannot, due to alternating current nature). 
-However the main advantage of AC is that it can more efficiently transmit energy over long distances using transmission lines (varying voltage with time, not spatially). This led to the wide adoption of AC power over DC power for large scale power transmission and distribution. 

Anyway despite these differences, the fact is that Tesla actually invented both systems of power, and both systems were certainly important steps forward in the development of modern electric power transmission and AC motors. While Edison famously promoted DC electricity and perhaps overstated its advantages over AC electricity, modern AC electricity has become the dominant system in power transmission and distribution around the world, while DC has remained the preferred system for localized and portably applications, such as battery powered devices and electrical circuits which only consume a small amount of power.Human:So Tesla promoted alternating current as the better option and it was adopted over direct current.Assistant:
samples.policy: Yes, that is correct! Tesla's preferred system of electricity was alternating current, also referred to as "AC" and "Direct Current" to distinguish between the two types of power. However, the first electric motors and generators were based on direct current, and it was not until the development of AC systems that electric motors and generators became more widely used. AC and DC were each essential advances in the development of modern power systems and have played important roles in industrialized economies around the world.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you tell me the laws for pedestrians using a crosswalk with a signal?Assistant:
samples.chosen:

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.
